# Bio

:::float-image

```{r out.width='200px', out.extra='style="float:right; margin-left:15px; margin-right:15px; clip-path: circle();"', echo=FALSE}
knitr::include_graphics("https://pbs.twimg.com/profile_images/1224995454707847168/l0HgpU14.jpg")
```

Dax is a data analyst at the Atlas of Living Australia (ALA). He facilitates that the ALA uses scientific rigour and transparency in their work, and makes it easier for researchers to do the same. He also supports much of the R coding used in Labs ALA.
:::
